about_the_game:
Alternate coloring for Dracula’s iconic costume from Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2. Taking its cues from the classic designs of past Castlevania games, this costume includes the traditional white hair and beard coloring for the ultimate Prince of Darkness.

You will be able to change Dracula's appearance from "Game Options" in the "Configuration" menu.
detailed_description:
Alternate coloring for Dracula’s iconic costume from Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2. Taking its cues from the classic designs of past Castlevania games, this costume includes the traditional white hair and beard coloring for the ultimate Prince of Darkness.

You will be able to change Dracula's appearance from "Game Options" in the "Configuration" menu.
